Package org.world.agents.player.melee

Class AttackNode

java.lang.Object
org.world.agents.player.melee.ComboNode
org.world.agents.player.melee.AttackNode
public class AttackNode
extends ComboNode
The AttackNode class extends the functionality of the ComboNode class to allow for the implementation of different attacks for the player. Because of this it contains some additional information compared to the other node types

  • Field Summary

    Fields 
    Modifier and Type Field Description
    boolean canStabEnemy
    Flags whether this attack can stab an enemy, allowing the player to move them around and throw them
    int damage
    Amount of damage done to enemies by this attack
    static boolean HORIZONTAL
    Constant to flag the attack performed by this node as horizontal
    private boolean shake
    Flags whether this attack should produce screen shake at the end of the attack
    private int shakeDuration
    The duration of the screen shake in 1/60ths of a second, recommended values are around 10
    private int shakeIntensity
    The intensity of the screen shake, should use relatively low values, 3 or less
    boolean sweepType
    Useful for computing which enemies should be hit by the attack
    static boolean VERTICAL
    Constant to flag the attack performed by this node ans vertical

    Fields inherited from class org.world.agents.player.melee.ComboNode

    baseDuration, canDodge, canMove, canThrowStabbedEnemy, comboWindow, Dodge, DrawSheath, duration, finished, finishEffect, graph, Heavy, Light, next, playerAnimation, Special, staminaCost, startEffect, time, TimeUp, weaponAnimation, xOffset, yOffset

  • Constructor Details

    • AttackNode

      public AttackNode​(ComboGraph graph, int WA, int PA, boolean dodge, boolean move, boolean canThrow, int x, int y, int damage, int duration, int window, java.lang.String finishSoundPath, java.lang.String startSoundPath, boolean shake, int intensity, int shakeDuration, boolean sweepType, int staminaCost)
      Creates a new attack node with the given parameters
      Parameters:
      graph - reference to the ComboGraph object containing then node
      WA - index of the weapon animation associated with this node
      PA - index of the player animation associated with this node
      dodge - whether the player can dodge at the end fo this state
      move - whether the player can move during this state
      canThrow - whether the player can throw an enemy in this state
      x - horizontal offset of the weapon relative to the player
      y - vertical offset of the camera relative to the player
      damage - damage dealt by this attack
      duration - duration of the state
      window - time at the end of the state during which input is polled for deciding the next state
      finishSoundPath - string containing the path to the sound file, can be null
      startSoundPath - string containing the path to the sound file, can be null
      shake - whether this attack should cause screen shake at the end
      intensity - screen shake intensity (recommended to be lower than 3)
      shakeDuration - duration of the screen shake in 1/60ths of a second (recommended value 10)
      sweepType - whether the attack is vertical or horizontal (use constants provided by this class)
      staminaCost - amount of stamina that the player should use to perform this attack
